name: MAYHEM Mario Bros.
description:
A fan game inspired by Level up's Mario mayhem series! - 
You as Mario, takes on deadly mazes filled with Spikes, lava, zombies and more!

Controls

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space bar to jump (hold to jump higher!) 

Easy controls eh!?

Share your completion time in the comments below :}
And also, if you liked this game and want more levels like this, please share it and comment your reviews below :]

Made with Godot Game Engine,
All the assets taken from Spriter's Resources and Sounds Resourses while some made by me and some taken from YouTube.
Title Screen Song - Secret Course (8-BIT) - Super Mario Sunshine
Background Song - Super Mario Bros. 3 - Underground (Breakbeat Remix)
